numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The acceptance rate for legacy applicants is higher than the acceptance rate for applicants without legacy status.
2. This difference is especially large for the top 0.1% of applicants.
3. A top-0.1% legacy applicant is 7 times more likely to be accepted than a top-0.1% applicant without legacy status.
4. The acceptance rate for applicants without legacy status drops below the average acceptance rate.
5. I ask why the acceptance rate for applicants without legacy status drops below the average acceptance rate.
6. I ask why the boost for the top 0.1% is so high.
7. I am a high school student.
8. I will be the first person in my family who attends college.
9. I find it interesting to see advantages of other applicants over me.
10. The graph compares students who have the same test scores.
11. Some students come from wealthy families.
12. Students who come from wealthy families have an advantage over other students.
13. The headline is: Your Dream College Wants Daddy's Money, Not You.
